title: Body text choice to go with Gravur Condensed headers
content:
Need something to go with Gravur Condensed.

Needs to be good to go at small sizes (10-12pt) in columns of body text.

Readership - wide age, students to execs, all design savvy.

Just looking for inspiration really.

thanks

 [‹ Choosing point size and leading for posters with lots of information](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123504/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42982 "Go to previous forum topic") [Uppercase kra? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123504/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42968 "Go to next forum topic")
author: yoyoyo1

comments.content:
Hello Yoyo,

My choice would be Bodoni.

Yo

-Andre
